wikipedia_page.main: Russell Simon Garcia (born 20 June 1970 in Portsmouth, England) is an English field hockey coach and a former England & GB field hockey player. He won a gold medal with Great Britain at the 1988 Summer Olympics in Seoul at the age of 18 years 3 months.
